content.description: Start on the right side under the overhang and climb the right side arete using sidepulls on the left dead point to a small jug and grab sidepull under the overhang on your left and top out.  A harder sit start may also exist. The rating is open to discussion.
content.location: It si located on the Black Pearl Boulder on the right side of a large boulder with vertical crack and two bolt anchor on top.  The large crack is visible on the right side of the fire road.

content.description: Sit start to Kill Russ Vol. 1. Start on a slopey left hand under the obvious left hand pinch/crimp and lower, slopey edge right hand around the arete. Climb up into Kill Russ Vol. 1, and top out!
content.location: This ascends the Black Pearl Boulder in Quarry Land. It's on the right side of the main trail and somewhat higher up than other boulders.

content.description: This boulder is up on a plateau.
